translation: You have spend all available funds with no delivery. Statistically speaking it's a common situation. Great thing - it is a game. Just try again!
Each region will contain several scenarios. But for now there is only one. Select the highlighted region to start your journey!
Select your first project to start the development of your product. Funds are limited. Green points are good. Red points are bad.
Hire new team members. They will increase funds burn rate, but will help you get more points.
Actions will help you reduce red points, but will take time to complete, pausing project development.
